data.title: 16 yrs), Delhi NCR/Haryana/Gurgaon/Gurugram, IT Consulting,Oracle,IT Project Management,Agile, IIM MBA Jobs
data.meta_description: Oracle Agile PLM Consultant - IT (8-16 yrs), Delhi NCR/Haryana/Gurgaon/Gurugram, IT Consulting,Oracle,IT Project Management,Agile, iim mba jobs - iimjobs.com
data.text:
Responsibilities:

- Support the strategy and vision of Enterprise PLM team on solution design, development and configuration.

- Responsible for maintaining process design documents (BP95, MD50, CV40)

- Will be responsible for managing data migration activities in major and minor projects.

- Collaborate with business functions and IT teams on the definition, planning, modeling, governance, and implementation of PLM capabilities.

- Help with requirements gathering with business customer for major & minor projects.

- Ensure ownership and accountability to effectively resolve gaps to completion.

- Work proactively to identify gaps and prepare countermeasures.

- Familiarity of the following areas would be beneficial. a.) Change Management b.) Product Documentation data structures - Items, BOMs, documents c.) Quality & Regulatory

Skills:

- Solid proven background on Agile PLM implementation.

- Experience in handling large data migration activities.

- Experience in understanding business problems and translate to functional requirements and scope in terms of implementation.

- Should possess strong functional knowledge in PLM domain.

- Demonstrated ability to clearly articulate how business functionality can be mapped.

- Creativity & Critical thinking skills applied through strong technical and business acumen.

- Excellent collaboration, verbal and written communication skills

This job opening was posted long time back. It may not be active. Nor was it removed by the recruiter. Please use your discretion.

2-Step Verification - Action Required
